Construct an iterator.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value_initialization|Value-initializes]] the underlying tuple of iterators to their default values.

@2@ Conversion from {{c|/*iterator*/&lt;false&gt;}} to {{c|/*iterator*/&lt;true&gt;}}. Move constructs the underlying tuple of iterators {{tt|''current_''}} with {{c|std::move(i.current)}}.

This iterator also has a private constructor which is used by {{lc|zip_view::begin}} and {{lc|zip_view::end}}. This constructor is not accessible to users.
